Once \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* Aaron \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3722"\w* \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* altar. \w Throughout|strong="H1755"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3722"\w* \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w annually|strong="H8141"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w*. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* altar \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w Everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* crosses \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w counted|strong="H6485"\w* must \w pay|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w half|strong="H4276"\w* \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* weighs \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w gerahs|strong="H1626"\w*. \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w half|strong="H4276"\w* \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w age|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w older|strong="H4605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* crosses \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H5414"\w* \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w making|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w atone|strong="H3722"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w more|strong="H7235"\w* \w than|strong="H7235"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w half|strong="H4276"\w* \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w less|strong="H4591"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w use|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*. \w It|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w serve|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*.”

“\w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w are|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* \w basin|strong="H3595"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* \w stand|strong="H3653"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w washing|strong="H7364"\w*. \w Set|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* between \w the|strong="H5414"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w* \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*,

\w Thus|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* \w their|strong="H7364"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*; \w this|strong="H4191"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w permanent|strong="H5769"\w* \w statute|strong="H2706"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H7364"\w* \w descendants|strong="H2233"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w*.”
\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w finest|strong="H7218"\w* \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*: 500 shekels \w of|strong="H7218"\w* liquid \w myrrh|strong="H4753"\w*, \w half|strong="H4276"\w* \w that|strong="H7070"\w* amount (250 shekels) \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w fragrant|strong="H1314"\w* \w cinnamon|strong="H7076"\w*, 250 shekels \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w fragrant|strong="H1314"\w* \w cane|strong="H7070"\w*,

500 \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* \w of|strong="H8255"\w* \w cassia|strong="H6916"\w*—all according \w to|strong="H2568"\w* \w the|strong="H3967"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*—\w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* \w of|strong="H8255"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.

\w Prepare|strong="H6213"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacred|strong="H6944"\w* \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fragrant blend, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w perfumer|strong="H7543"\w*; \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacred|strong="H6944"\w* \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.

Use this \w oil|strong="H4886"\w* \w to|strong="H4150"\w* \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* \w the|strong="H4886"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H4150"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*, \w the|strong="H4886"\w* ark \w of|strong="H4150"\w* \w the|strong="H4886"\w* \w Testimony|strong="H5715"\w*,

\w Anoint|strong="H4886"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H6942"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w consecrate|strong="H6942"\w* \w them|strong="H6942"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w serve|strong="H3547"\w* \w Me|strong="H4886"\w* \w as|strong="H3547"\w* \w priests|strong="H3547"\w*.

\w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w used|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* anoint \w an|strong="H6213"\w* ordinary \w man|strong="H1320"\w*, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w anything|strong="H6213"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* formula. \w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*.
